directions: Drizzle each slice of bread evenly with truffle oil and cover 4 bread slices with slices of buffalo mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, and tomato slices. Season to taste with sea salt and black pepper. Top each sandwich with a remaining bread slice.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons white truffle oil, or to taste
1/2 cup fresh basil leaves, or to taste
coarse sea salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Caprese Salad Sandwiches
